statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_decision_support_system WHERE patient_id = 1;

SELECT diagnosis, COUNT(*) AS diagnosis_count FROM clinical_decision_support_system GROUP BY diagnosis HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
